config: Keeping your profile up-to-date helps individuals and businesses find lawyers like you. Here are a few quick tips that can help you reach even more qualified clients.

Thank you for updating your Justia & LII profiles. Keeping your profile up-to-date helps the hundreds of thousands of individuals and businesses who use the Justia & LII Lawyer Directories each month to find lawyers like you.
As a thank you for taking the time to update your profile, we are offering a 10% DISCOUNT on any new Gold yearly premium placement subscription.
Additionally we are offering you a free one-on-one in-depth profile review with one of our senior consultants so that you may get the most out of your free profile.
Or call us at (888) 587-8421
* This offer expires 30 days from receipt of this email.
